document.full_text: if you have asthma, your doctor might have you on heartburn drugs to ease your wheezing. but that's not necessarily a good idea, according to a fresh look at the medical evidence.
document.title: heartburn drugs offer little asthma relief: study
lines_and_colors: if you have asthma, your doctor might have you on heartburn drugs to ease your wheezing. but that's not necessarily a good idea, according to a fresh look at the medical evidence.
